author: andyc
msg: Adding these files in preparation of identity constraint support
(serial/streaming only). Besides, the new code for Namespace-
Support already implements NamespaceContext. And I think that the
document fragment interface is a generally useful thing to have
as part of the native interface.

author: andyc
msg: 1) Fixes done for namespace support. Seems to work correctly
and pass the correct values now.
2) Fixed validation problems with DTDs and namespaces.
3) In process of performing massive code cleaning -- prepare
for more.

author: andyc
msg: 1) Fixed some sample bugs.
2) Updated samples to provide stack trace in case of really
bad error -- exception was thrown out from parser or by
some application handler registered with the parser during
a callback.

author: andyc
msg: Makefile fixed to reflect new sample class files.

author: andyc
msg: Fix for SAX2 startDTD callback so that it has the root element name
and public and system identifiers in the case where there is an
internal subset. This is a change in behavior from the previous
Xerces2 where it would wait until it verified that the entire
doctype decl line had been parsed (including internal subset)
before making the notification.
NOTE: I don't like calling the doctypeDecl callback until end of the
*full* doctype line (including internal subset) is parsed
correctly but SAX2 requires that it knows the root element
name and public and system identifier for the startDTD call.
It's not that bad; it just feels wrong to notify the handler
of the doctype line when we haven't finished parsing it, yet.
